We blog about great travel experiences so you can enjoy yours.

Charter Vacations for the Family

Chartering a yacht for your next family vacation is a great way of fulfilling everybody’s wish-list in one itinerary, with plenty of time for creating memories for many life times.

Join in the racing or simply soak up the ambience of a world-class sailing regatta for your next charter yacht vacation.

Do you dream of calling one of the iconic superyachts of the world YOURS?

February 11, 2016

A Luxury Yacht Charter Ticks All the Boxes

A Luxury yacht charter ticks all the boxes on the vacation list: exotic islands, occasional port visits, remote anchorages, family-friendly fun, plus all the superlatives of the superyacht lifestyle, minus the complications of ownership, and you don’t have to keep packing and unpacking bags as you move from destination to destination

February 08, 2016

Luxury Charter Group well represented on CYBA

The Charter Yacht Brokers Association (CYBA) is the recognised international professional body of yacht charter brokers worldwide. Charter Clients can be confident to book with a CYBA accredited Charter Agent, because to become members Agents must meet strict professional industry criteria.

February 05, 2016

Swapping Snow for Sunshine

Take advantage of these special sailing rates, and getaway to the Caribbean warmth for sailing, swimming and fun in the sun

February 02, 2016

Bahamas Beckon

Dreaming of a winter escape? Nothing takes the edge off the chilly tail-end of winter than a week (or two) on your own luxury charter yacht in the Bahamas.

February 02, 2016

7 reasons to charter in the Leeward Islands

The Caribbean’s Leeward Islands abounds in cruising delights for charter yacht guests: 2,500 miles of cruising from east to west, some 7,000 islands, reefs, inlets and bays and a kaleidoscope of experiences.

January 18, 2016

Up to 30% DISCOUNT in the CARIBBEAN When it comes to your luxury charter vacation, megayachts equal mega delight.

January 15, 2016

A SCORPION’S Tale

There could be nothing better than a Caribbean dream vacation aboard the latest superyacht launched by Sanlorenzo – the 150-foot SCORPION that promises the superlative charter yacht experience, from her dizzying luxury, to delectable cuisine and myriad watertoys onboard.

November 23, 2015

100 yachts, 5 days at Antigua Charter Yacht Show

Luxury Charter Group Team is attending the 54th Antigua Charter Yacht Show where they will inspect almost 100 charter yachts on Show. From December 4 - 9 the crème of the luxury charter fleet, captains, crew and specialist international charter brokers will meet at the world’s largest charter yacht event

November 20, 2015

Charter yacht dreams come true in the Caribbean

Just a few hours from the US, an 8- 10 hour flight from Europe, and a million miles from stress, the Caribbean remains the idyllic charter yacht destination that seduces sailors and sun-chasers from all over the globe

November 16, 2015

19TH HOLE New Charter Catamaran

Picture yourself and your guests reclining on the spacious flybridge of this superb luxury charter yacht, the 74-foot 19TH HOLE, cruising the Caribbean over the holidays in what will be a truly epic adventure

November 08, 2015

See you at the BVI Charter Yacht Show!

The idyllic venue of Nanny Cay Resort and Marina will host the 34th Annual Charter Yacht Show, 9 to 12 November, attracting some of the most popular and most recent additions to the charter yacht fleet
